column4: How do I play a file like this dollhouse.s01e00.2009.BluRay.1080p.DTS.x264.dxva-Framestor.mkv.[00:13]
mplayer not playing it?
that's a Mastoika-cant spell it- file
trying...
you can't just add that to your xorg.conf ?
no it all breaks
with what error? pastie it
I only see one monitor
... well there was another
I see a twinview option but -- you never define the other monitor with the twinview?
http://pastie.org/995707
it looks like after it loads multitouch, it loads mouse9
umm, I'm not seeing an error in there
here's another log
ok cool, got the xorg.conf to go with that?
what happened was when i tried to move my mouse back from the external monitor it wouldn't let me
unless I can see the error log with the error in it and the conf file that generated it I doubt I can help you
you think i should just append that and it should word. but doesn't twinview only hook into Mouse0
I need the conf file that generated that error
i guess what I'm trying to say is what does identifier do in xorg.conf

InputClass defines a general specification for a variety of devices, each taht normally want to define their own INput section, that all match the spec -- I think it's purpose was to allow people to define a general class for like Wacom tablet for example...
